description.oldValue:
Walkie Talkie, a push-to-talk experience that
enables clear and secure voice communication over the cloud, enables teams to
communicate instantly on a channel. Through this new functionality, users can
now pin up to 5 favorite channels on the walkie talkie home screen, enabling
users to quickly switch between these preselected channels to listen to
incoming transmission or initiate PTT transmissions.
description.newValue: Walkie Talkie, a push-to-talk experience that enables clear and secure voice communication over the cloud, enables teams to communicate instantly on a channel. Through this new functionality, users can now pin up to 5 favorite channels on the walkie talkie home screen, enabling users to quickly switch between these preselected channels to listen to incoming transmission or initiate PTT transmissions. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap item to align with the deployment information communicated in Message center.
